channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Business Card
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Business Card

item.title: CVE-2024-5807|2024-08-01T21:25:02.833Z -- unknown -- business%20card
item.description: The Business Card WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not prevent high privilege users like administrators from uploading malicious PHP files, which could allow them to run arbitrary code on servers hosting their site, even in MultiSite configurations.

item.title: CVE-2024-5807|2024-07-30T15:46:25.577Z -- unknown -- business%20card
item.description: The Business Card WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not prevent high privilege users like administrators from uploading malicious PHP files, which could allow them to run arbitrary code on servers hosting their site, even in MultiSite configurations.

item.title: CVE-2024-4532|2024-06-13T20:40:22.431Z -- unknown -- business%20card
item.description: The Business Card WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions such as deleting cards via CSRF attacks

item.title: CVE-2024-4531|2024-06-04T17:54:02.001Z -- unknown -- business%20card
item.description: The Business Card WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions such as editing cards via CSRF attacks
